attributes.action: Step up the measures for the prevention and immunisation of the coronavirus
attributes.additional_details:
As the rise in people who have contracted the Coronavirus and no know effects it has on humans as well as how it is contracted and passed on. Governments should now put into place extreme measures to suppress this virus and continue the necessary medical research to immunise. 
We as a country need to take steps in finding a vaccine and the government should be putting structure restrictions and exclusions to help prevent a wide spread pandemic and cost to human life.
attributes.background: Close all schools, places of work (with restriction on NHS/health care services, care homes etc) to place restrictions & cerfuws in larger towns and cities. To be paid full pay for the 14 days of self isolation Cancel all public events Boost the measures up to pandemic and exclusion.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301397

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
